question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. airport lounge
B. airplane
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The airplane is in the foreground with people boarding it, while the airport lounge is clearly in the distant background, making the depth relationship very obvious.
